Data: de Grandhomme to Smith, no run good length outside off, 122 kph, a bit of gentle away movement for de Grandhomme. Left alone
de Grandhomme to Smith, 1 run on the pads, poor delivery, worked down to fine leg
de Grandhomme to Bailey, no run 125 kph, full delivery outside off, good leave
de Grandhomme to Bailey, no run a tad too full outside off, a mis-timed drive finds mid-off
de Grandhomme to Bailey, no run 124 kph, not very pacey but accurate. Close to off on a good length. Defended
de Grandhomme to Bailey, no run 126 kph, overpitched outside off, mis-times it again. May be the result of his accentuated closed stance. Can't get his hands through the line as easily, as fluently
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run 151 kph, good length outside off, steered to third man
Ferguson to Bailey, no run 150 kph, good length outside off, pushed to cover
Ferguson to Bailey, no run 151 kph, a big appeal. Good length on off, the ball shapes back in. Bailey is beaten on the inside edge as the ball comes back in. Strikes Bailey just outside off.
Ferguson to Bailey, no run 150 ks again. cuts Bailey in half after missing a push
Ferguson to Bailey, 1 run 150 kph, good length outside off, a thick outside edge down to third man.
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run 146 kph, short on off, pulled to deep square leg
de Grandhomme to Smith, 1 run nudged to fine leg
de Grandhomme to Bailey, 2 runs another inside edge. 127 kph, fullish delivery outside off, a thick inside edge juuuust misses off stump. Takes a bit of the stump mic on its way to fine leg
de Grandhomme to Bailey, 1 run worked to fine leg. Poor lines
de Grandhomme to Smith, 1 run 126 kph, good length on middle, worked away to deep square leg
de Grandhomme to Bailey, 1 run a tad too full, driven through cover
de Grandhomme to Smith, 1 run a slow, short, nothing delivery on leg. Pulled down ti fine leg with so much ease
Ferguson to Smith, (no ball) 1 run 148 kph, good length on off, worked to fine leg. Ferguson has overstepped.
Ferguson to Bailey, no run fantastic delivery. 148 kph, wide yorker. Bailey misses his glide. Beaten for pace
Ferguson to Bailey, 1 run 148 kph, good length outside off, Bailey pulls to deep square leg. Not quite timed
Ferguson to Smith, FOUR runs 152 kph. Very quick but can't bowl there, full on Smith's pads, worked away through midwicket easily
Ferguson to Smith, no run 147 kph, full outside off, defended
Ferguson to Smith, no run good length outside off, tapped back. Looked to go through the off side
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run 149 kph, full and straight, pushed out to mid-on for one
de Grandhomme to Smith, no run 125 kph, good length just outside off, a blotched push into the off side
de Grandhomme to Smith, no run 128 kph, good length moving away. Guided to point from the crease
de Grandhomme to Smith, 2 runs hmm, another inside edge. Short and wide outside off, Smith looks to cut but gets a thick edge to fine leg
de Grandhomme to Smith, no run full outside off, no stroke
de Grandhomme to Smith, 1 run 126 kph, on the pads, nudged to deep square leg
de Grandhomme to Bailey, no run 128 kph, full on off, shovelled to midwicket
Santner to Smith, no run 87 kph, full outside off, defended to cover. Not much turn
Santner to Smith, 1 run short and slow on off, worked to deep square leg. Easily clipped
Santner to Bailey, no run better. Full and quick, pushed through. Defended back
Santner to Bailey, no run uses his feet, comes down and defends. Well bowled again
Santner to Bailey, no run sees Bailey coming and fires it in outside off, Bailey defends
Santner to Bailey, 1 run short on the pads, pulled emphatically to deep square leg
de Grandhomme to Bailey, no run 123 kph, good length on off, pushed to mid-on
de Grandhomme to Bailey, SIX runs lovely stroke. Full and wide outside off, Bailey stays in his crease and lofts the ball easily over mid-off. Clears the short boundary.
de Grandhomme to Bailey, 1 run good length on off, nudged away to deep square leg
de Grandhomme to Smith, no run a bit of shape. Full and wide, moving away. Guided to point
de Grandhomme to Smith, no run worked away to square leg
de Grandhomme to Smith, no run short and wide, a nothing delivery at 125 kph. The ball goes over the bat of Smith's cut
Santner to Bailey, 1 run 90 kph, tossed up outside off, driven down to mid-off
Santner to Smith, 1 run 83 kph, worked away to midwicket from the back foot
Santner to Bailey, 1 run pushed to long-off from the front foot
Santner to Smith, 1 run another simple nudge through midwicket for one
Santner to Bailey, 1 run flatter and quicker on the pads, worked away to deep square leg for one more. Five singles off the over
Santner to Smith, 1 run short and wide, scythes to deep point
Neesham to Smith, no run full delivery outside off, defended towards cover
Neesham to Smith, no run 133 kph, overpitched outside off, defended into the off side. Nice channel
Neesham to Smith, no run 134 kph, full on off, pushed to mid-on
Neesham to Smith, FOUR runs after three good deliveries, Neesham dishes out one short and wide. Smith transfers his weight back and cuts past backward point. Made that look easy
Neesham to Smith, 1 run on the pads, worked to midwicket. Bailey had to hustle through for one

Neesham to Bailey, OUT umpire Dharmasena checking if it has carried. That looked like it did. The third umpire is being called. Soft signal is out. Bailey trudging off. Goes in cleanly. And that will be the end of Bailey. Quite a terrible delivery, full down leg. Bailey gets a little bit of bat on that, carries low to Watling's lef
Boult to Smith, 1 run 134 kph, full and wide, slashed to deep point
Boult to Marsh, no run 134 kph, full outside off, Marsh lets this one go
Boult to Marsh, 1 run airy. 132 kph, full and wide, Marsh gets down on one knee and caresses his drive but fails to keep it down. Through the cover region for one
Boult to Smith, no run full outside off, pushed to mid-off
Boult to Smith, 1 run 135 kph, on the pads, worked away through midwicket for a run
Boult to Marsh, no run 139 kph, good length outside off, blocked towards point

Neesham to Smith, OUT gone! Marsh is run-out at the non-strikers end. Punches his bat in disgust. Full delivery on off, Smith drives it crisply and cleanly back at the bowler's right. Neesham mis-fields but gets his hands to the ball. It ricochets slightly but into the non-strikers stumps. Marsh was backing up and has been caught m
Neesham to Smith, no run on the pads, worked to midwicket
Neesham to Smith, 1 run on the pads, clipped to fine leg
Neesham to Head, no run 134 kph, good length close to off, pushed towards cover
Neesham to Head, no run 136 kph, overpitched outside off, drilled to mid-off on the up
Neesham to Head, no run 132 kph, good length outside off, a flayed cut to point
Boult to Smith, no run 140 kph, back of a length outside off, punched from the back foot to cover
Boult to Smith, no run fantastic lines. Close to off, defended back
Boult to Smith, 2 runs short delivery on off, pulled through backward square leg for a couple more
Boult to Smith, 1 run fifty for Smith. Has been lucky, but has ensured he's made the runs. Full and wide, carved through cover point for a run
Boult to Head, no run 140 kph, back of a length on off, Head gets on top of the bounce and defends
Boult to Head, no run 141 kph, good length around off. Impeccable lines. Shovelled to square leg with a strong bottom hand
Neesham to Smith, no run fullish on off, worked to midwicket
Neesham to Smith, no run full on off, driven back to the bowler. Giving Smith nothing, great bowling
Neesham to Smith, 1 run worked away to fine leg for one. Drags it from off stump
Neesham to Head, 1 wide strays down leg, a free run, wide
Neesham to Head, 1 run full and wide outside off, Head goes after it but gets a thick inside edge which misses the stumps again
Neesham to Smith, 1 run short outside off, dabbed down to third man for one. Australia's 100 up
Neesham to Head, no run a tad too full, driven to mid-off
Ferguson to Smith, no run 146 kph, good length outside off, comes back in. Defended back
Ferguson to Smith, no run shortish and a touch of width. Punched to point from the crease
Ferguson to Smith, no run bouncer, loopy, outside off. Smith easily avoids it
Ferguson to Smith, no run 144 kph, good length on off and middle, defended
Ferguson to Smith, no run 145 kph, overpitched on off, driven back to the bowler
Ferguson to Smith, (no ball) FOUR runs five runs. Short and wide from Ferguson. Smith cuts in front of point for four. On top of the bounce. Lovely stroke. A no ball too
Ferguson to Smith, 2 runs slower ball, 118 kph, short outside off. Pulled over midwicket for a couple
Neesham to Head, FOUR runs through mid-on for four. Overpitched outside off, Head mis-times his drive, but a strong bottom hand takes the ball past mid-on for four
Neesham to Head, 1 wide full and very wide, 135 kph. Head misses his cut. Wide
Neesham to Head, no run 135 kph, full and close to off, defended into the off side
Neesham to Head, 2 runs 136 kph, worked away through backward square leg for a couple more. Good shot
Neesham to Head, 1 wide another wide, 135 kph, down the leg side. Called

Neesham to Head, 2 runs dropped. Henry drops a sitter. Oh my. Unusual. Full and wide outside off from Neesham. Head drives with bat well away from the pad. Hits it straight to Henry at mid-off, who looks to take it reverse-cupped catch. Bursts through his hands. Big moment in the game
Neesham to Head, no run
Neesham to Head, 1 wide another wide. Down leg, and Head misses his flick.
Neesham to Head, FOUR runs 131 kph, back of a length on the pads. Head gets a bit of bat in his flick, races away to the fine leg boundary
Ferguson to Smith, no run good length around off, defended back. Straight face
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run
Ferguson to Head, 1 run good length outside off, 143 kph. Pushed to deep cover from the back foot. Nice shot
Ferguson to Smith, no run 143 kph, good length outside off, Smith nudges this into the leg side
Ferguson to Smith, no run 146.5 kph, good length close to off stump. Smith stays in his crease and defends
Ferguson to Smith, no run 123 kph, slower ball on off. Driven back powerfully
Henry to Head, 1 run full outside off, shovelled through square leg for one. Head looking to belt everything, a focus on power as opposed to timing
Henry to Smith, 1 run 132 kph, good length on off, pulled through square leg
Henry to Head, (no ball) 1 run 138 kph, full and wide outside off, Head slashes and gets one to third man. Another no-ball, knocks the stumps down with his leg at the bolwer's end. Sloppy from NZ
Henry to Smith, FOUR runs short delivery on off, Smith backs away and swats his pull over mid-on for four
Henry to Smith, no run 136 kph, close to off, defended
Henry to Smith, no run 135 kph, full outside off, blocked into the off side
Henry to Smith, 1 run 133 kph, overpitched outside off, driven through cover for a run
Santner to Smith, FOUR runs drops short and Smith hekps himself to four with a well-executed pull over midwicket. Simple batting basics
Santner to Smith, 1 run tossed up on leg, driven to long-on
Santner to Head, 1 run short and wide, slapped to deep cover for a run
Santner to Smith, no run on the pads, 89 kph, worked to short fine leg
Santner to Smith, 1 run shortish outside off, cut to deep point
Santner to Head, FOUR runs superb shot. Too full, rather wide. Caressed through cover with a sublime drive. Between cover and mid-off
Henry to Smith, 1 run 137 kph, back of a length on off, pulled to deep square leg. On top of the bounce, kept down
Henry to Head, 1 run good length outside off, 138 kph. Dabbed down to third man
Henry to Smith, no run 137 kph, a crisp drive to cover
Henry to Smith, FOUR runs 138 kph, lovely shot, back of a length down leg. Smith pulls it away through backward square leg with a lovely pull. Kept that down too, found the gap
Henry to Smith, no run good length outside off, 136 kph. Blocked
Henry to Smith, FOUR runs too full this time. Four more easy runs. Overpitched on middle, Smith on-drives perfectly through mid-on.
Santner to Head, no run 92 kph, tossed up outside off, driven to short cover
Santner to Head, no run on the pads, flicked to midwicket
Santner to Head, 1 run drops short again, hammered to deep square leg who does well, scurrying to his right. Latham
Santner to Smith, no run slow and on the pads, Smith misses his flick. Struck on the pad
Santner to Smith, no run slow through the air, full on off. Defended
Santner to Smith, 1 run shortish on the pads, worked to deep midwicket for one
de Grandhomme to Smith, 1 run on the pads again, worked down to fine leg
de Grandhomme to Head, no run 112 kph, full on off. Driven to mid-off
de Grandhomme to Head, no run good length outside off, 123 kph. Dabbed to backward point
de Grandhomme to Head, 1 run full and wide, slashed through the off side
de Grandhomme to Smith, no run full outside off, 125 kph, defended
de Grandhomme to Smith, no run lovely end. Full and straight, Smith blocks
Santner to Head, no run flat on off and middle, skewed to short third man. Head sends his captain back just in time
Santner to Head, no run 90 kph, full on middle, driven back to the bowler
Santner to Head, 1 run 82 kph, short and wide outside off, slapped to deep cover
Santner to Smith, no run slow through the air, full on middle. Blocked. Excellent delivery, loopy
Santner to Smith, 2 runs short on the pads, 83 kph. Flicked with the power in his wrists through deep square leg for a couple more
Santner to Smith, no run 93 kph, flat outside off, carved towards point
de Grandhomme to Head, FOUR runs 118 kph, short and wide, and hammered. Lays into his cut through point, too much width from de Grandhomme
de Grandhomme to Head, no run ooh, fullish and closer to off this time. Head wants one down to third man but the ball misses the bat
de Grandhomme to Head, 1 run dabs one to third man, 123 kph. Good follow-up
de Grandhomme to Smith, no run 127 kph, full delivery outside off, glided down towards point
de Grandhomme to Smith, 1 run 127 ks, worked through square leg for a run
de Grandhomme to Head, 1 run 126 kph, short and wide again, hammered to deep point for one
Santner to Head, no run tossed up on leg, driven back
Santner to Head, no run 94 kph, low full toss on the pads, Head flicks to midwicket. Should have done more with that
Santner to Head, no run well bowled. 82 ks, slow outside off, nudged towards point
Santner to Head, 1 run shortish and wide, Head hurries back and cuts to deep point.
Santner to Smith, 1 run loads of air on that, tosses that up, full on middle and leg, driven with ease to long-on for one
Santner to Head, 1 run ooh, a streaky shot. Head comes down and looks to hit over cover but the ball stays low, takes the inside edge towards fine leg
Ferguson to Head, 1 run back of a length on the pads, worked to deep square leg
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run 135 kph, shortish outside off, pushed through point for a run
Ferguson to Head, 1 run 135 kph, good length on off, Head gets on top of the bounce and opens the face to get one down to third man
Ferguson to Smith, (no ball) no no no. Another no-ball. Humongous no-ball. Overstepped. Short on off, pulled to midwicket
Ferguson to Smith, FOUR runs just over mid-off. 145 kph, full delivery on off and middle. Smith backs away and lofts the ball calmly over mid-off. Not great timing but just enough.
Ferguson to Smith, 1 wide 145 kph, down the leg side, another wide. Runs leaking
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run on the pads this time, another poor delivery. 143 kph, worked to fine leg
Ferguson to Head, no run 147 kph, full outside off, Head wafts and is beaten on the outside edge
Santner to Smith, 1 run full, and outside off, hint of turn, push-driven into the covers for one
Santner to Head, 2 runs flatter, straying into the hips, whipped off to the left of deep midwicket. They press on for the second
Santner to Head, no run tossed on middle and leg, much slower at 81.2ks, knocked more or less straight to midwicket
Santner to Head, no run slides on middle, at least 10ks faster than the previous ball, hit down the ground, the bowler scampers to his left to stop the ball
Santner to Head, 1 run full, straight ball on middle, Head hangs back and glides a single to cover
Santner to Smith, 1 run pushed through wider outside off, and Smith happily drives it down to long-off for a jogged single
Ferguson to Smith, FOUR runs 144ks short and outside off, hip-high delivery, sits up, swat-pulled away to the right of midwicket

Ferguson to Smith, 2 runs back of a length and angled in, 140.5ks, Smith gets inside the line and glances it fine on the leg side. He races across for the second. Raises his bat and celebrates his first ODI ton v New Zealand. Takes in the applause from his home crowd
Ferguson to Smith, 1 wide 144.1ks, dug short and angled down leg, Smith swerves inside the line. Pace can be your best friend. Pace can be your enemy too. Leg-side wide
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run back of a length and outside off, 120.2ks, slower and outside off, Smith waits patiently and plays a little checked-punch through the covers
Ferguson to Head, 1 run whipped away off the hips to deep midwicket
Ferguson to Smith, no run very full and outside off, 143ks, Smith is right forward to meet the pitch of the ball. Driven su-weetly, but extra cover throws himself to his left to stop the ball
Ferguson to Smith, no run 110ks slower bouncer outside off, bit of tennis-ball bounce, Smith leaves it be
Santner to Head, no run fired flatter and just a shade outside off, Head camps back and forces it back to Santner

Santner to Head, 1 run Australia chance a quick single. Umpire Dharmasena shakes his head, suggesting Smith is in. The TV umpire confirms it: Smith is in. New Zealand needed a direct hit to get Smith, who dishes out a full-length dive. The throw from mid-off was a bit wide from the stumps. Head skipped out of the crease, drilled it
Santner to Smith, 1 run flatter and quicker, whipped to the right of midwicket
Santner to Head, no run tucked away to midwicket
Santner to Head, 1 run slides on the hips, worked to midwicket's left
Santner to Smith, no run tossed up slower on middle, defended
Ferguson to Head, no run 141ks, short and slanted across off, swish and a miss
Ferguson to Head, 2 runs much fuller and outside off, Head brings out his carving knife and slices it over the covers
Ferguson to Head, no run slower delivery, pretty full on middle and leg, bunted to midwicket
Ferguson to Head, FOUR runs overpitched and outside off, shovel-driven with immense authority, just to the left of the bowler. Fifth boundary for the left-hander
Ferguson to Head, 1 run 119ks slower one on the pads, Head spots it, waits for the ball to arrive and then works it behind square. No violence here
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run shorter and angled in at off stump, Smith swivels back and pulls it in the air over square leg. There is a man patrolling the boundary
Santner to Smith, 1 run arm-ball slides in with the arm. Smith whips a single through square leg
Santner to Head, 1 run 94ks, flighted on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for one. Head moves to 49
Santner to Smith, 1 run uses his feet, gets closer to the pitch, and deliberately chips it in the air over midwicket. There is a man in the deep
Santner to Head, 1 run clipped off the hips through square leg. Head collects a half-century in his first ODI at home
Santner to Smith, 1 run Smith shuffles across, takes a straight ball, and twirls it through midwicket
Santner to Head, no run 95ks, hurled in, fizzes off the surface, no turn. Pings the front pad of Head as he eyes a leg-side flick. He weathers the lbw appeal, as it pitched outside leg
Henry to Smith, 1 run back of a length and outside off, Smith invests in a back-foot force square through the off side
Henry to Head, 1 run length and slanting away outside off, Head carves it out to deep point
Henry to Smith, 2 runs forceful whip from Smith. Full and on off, Smith, having moved across off, hits it in the air to the right of the square leg umpire

Henry to Smith, 2 runs banged in short and outside off, Smith pulls firmly to the left of de Grandhomme, who is about 20 metres in from the boundary. Good fielding from de Grandhomme, but Smith still picked off two
Henry to Smith, 1 run very full and straight, Smith's wrists have more work to do. Flicked away to deep midwicket
Henry to Head, 1 run full and angling away outside off, Head hammers a drive down to long-off. He attempted to over-hit the ball and lost his shape on it

Boult to Head, OUT Boult returns and finds a way past Smith and Head. He dives to his right from his follow-through and plucks out a smart, low catch with both hands. Full and angled in on off, possibly stopped a bit on the left-hander. He pushes in the air, and ends up lobbing a return catch. Excellent reflex catch
Boult to Wade, 2 runs short and angled in from over the wicket, helped fine of long leg
Boult to Wade, no run good length and outside off, pushed into the off side
Boult to Wade, no run short and outside off, jabbed with hard hands to point
Boult to Wade, 2 runs dug outside off, controls a back-foot pull to deep midwicket
Boult to Wade, no run back of a length on off, dabbed to cover. Smith is interested in a single, Wade sends him back
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run nice and full outside off, handsomely driven to deep cover
Ferguson to Wade, 1 run very full and angling away outside off, drilled away to sweeper cover
Ferguson to Smith, 2 runs slower short ball outside off, 115.2ks, Smith chances a second. He dishes out a full-length dive again, this looks closer

Ferguson to Smith, (no ball) FOUR runs that's an early Christmas present from Ferguson. Full-toss outside off, think the slower ball went awry. Very awry. Front-foot no-ball. Punches it crisply to the right of extra cover
Ferguson to Smith, SIX runs and Smith capitalises on the free-hit. Backs away outside leg, opens up his hips, and creams it inside out over extra cover. Lofted hit. Away she sails over the rope
Ferguson to Smith, 1 run very full on off, whipped with the wrists to midwicket
Ferguson to Wade, 2 runs short on leg stump, cramps Wade for room. Miscues the pull, gets it fine of long leg
Boult to Smith, 2 runs banged in short and angling away outside off, Smith attempts a hook and top-edges the ball over square leg. Latham runs back and mops it up
Boult to Smith, 1 run back of a length on middle and leg, whipped to midwicket
Boult to Wade, 1 run short and sits up outside off, flat-bats a cut to sweeper
Boult to Smith, 2 runs full and wide outside off, Smith likes it there, crunches a drive through the cover-point region

Boult to Smith, SIX runs slower ball, picked up and dispatched. Buh-bye ball. 115ks offering on the pads, Smith spots it, and flicks it smartly over backward square leg for another six. Fine leg is inside the circle, and no protection in the deep
Boult to Smith, 1 run full on middle and leg, possibly another slower one, worked away to square leg. Smith retains the strike
Neesham to Smith, 1 run starts off with what looks like a slower offcutter, worked away to fine leg
Neesham to Wade, SIX runs Wade joins the party in Sydney. Shortish on middle, Wade camps back and pull-swings it, baseball style into the stands beyond midwicket
Neesham to Wade, 1 run length and outside off, flat-batted powerfully down the ground, Santner dives full-length to his left from mid-off to intercept it
Neesham to Smith, 1 run very, very wristy again. Pitched up on off, chipped in the air over midwicket
Neesham to Wade, SIX runs and Wade sends Neesham into the stands beyond wide long-on now. Another slower one outside off, Wade hangs back and clobbers it away. 300 is definitely on

Neesham to Wade, SIX runs this is even better. Wade scoops a six over fine leg. Follows the violent blows with finesse. Full toss on middle, Wade pre-meditated. Goes low and shovels it, Smith enjoyed that too. 21 runs off the over, and 52 runs off the last three overs
Boult to Smith, SIX runs massive six. Back of a length and outside off, pulled away into the stands beyond square leg
Boult to Smith, 2 runs too full on middle and leg, whipped away to the right of deep midwicket

Boult to Smith, FOUR runs Smith celebrates his 150, and what a shot to bring up the landmark. Very full and angling away outside off, opens the face late and manipulates it very fine of short third man. This is now his best score in ODI cricket

Boult to Smith, 1 run Munro was wrong-footed, he dives late to his right, and attempts the catch with both hands, and just finger-tips it away. Pretty full and just a shade outside off, whipped in the air, the ball just flew of the bat, and Munro messed it up. New Zealand's fielding has let them down today
Boult to Wade, no run Wade uses his feet and forces the ball to square leg
Boult to Wade, 2 runs very full, drilled down the ground. Australia have plundered 67 runs off the last four overs

Henry to Smith, 2 runs short ball on middle, 121.7ks, swats it with a flat bat to wide long-on. The throw from the deep is wild, very wide of the stumps, the keeper can't collect the ball. Smith hares across for the second
Henry to Smith, no run slower bouncer outside off, below head-height, Smith has a swat at it early, and does not connect. Not called a wide
Henry to Smith, FOUR runs Smith races down the track, takes a half-volley, and belts it through the covers, to the left of a diving mid-off. The ball is flying away in Sydney
Henry to Smith, no run slower short ball, swatted to midwicket
Henry to Smith, 2 runs 118.3ks short ball, flapped in the air over square leg
Henry to Smith, 1 run hip-high short ball, pulled away, short fine leg dives to his left and keeps it to a single
Boult to Smith, 1 wide very full and wide outside off, past the tramline. Wide called. Boult smiles wryly, 300 up for Aus
Boult to Smith, 2 runs very full on off, whipped away to wide long-on. Smith passes AB's 162, he is now has the highest ODI score at the SCG

Boult to Smith, OUT Munro hangs onto a skier, Smith walks back to a standing ovation. Rousing reception for Smith from his home crowd. Williamson, Santner, and Guptill also congratulate Smith on his landmark. Back of a length and outside off, Smith has a hack at it, skews it in the air with the bottom hand flying off the bat. Munro
Boult to Wade, no run
Boult to Wade, no run slower cutter, 110ks, Wade slogs early and takes it on the pad
Boult to Wade, 1 run full on the stumps, hammered down the ground
Boult to Cummins, no run swish and a miss outside off

Henry to Wade, 2 runs someone finally nails a yorker, inside-edged behind square. Farcical fielding from NZ. The fielder at short fine leg collects the ball and has a wild throw, the ball goes towards cover (for a left-hander). Wade spots it, and aims for the second. Cummins isn't interested. The fielder at cover throws the ball at
Henry to Wade, FOUR runs dug short and outside off, clubbed away over midwicket
Henry to Wade, 2 runs Wade pre-meditates, aims a fine scoop, but this is pretty full and outside off. He checks his shot and drills it through the covers on his knees
Henry to Wade, no run hacked down to mid-off off the inside half

Henry to Wade, OUT Wade attempts another scoop, he only deflects it onto the stumps. Nice and full, outside off. Wade, having shuffled across, can't get enough bat on it. The zing bails go flying. He was looking to play it fine of fine leg, who had been brought up
Henry to Starc, 1 run back of a length and outside off, Starc punches it to the covers
Neesham to Starc, 2 runs full and outside off, sliced away to the right of sweeper cover
Neesham to Starc, FOUR runs very full on the pads, picked up and flicked in the air over square leg, no protection in the deep
Neesham to Starc, FOUR runs 114.6ks, slower full delivery outside off, Starc picks it up and launches it straight down the ground. One-bounce four

Neesham to Starc, OUT polite appeal for caught behind from Watling. Given out by umpire Martell. Did the brush the glove on its way? Or just the helmet? Starc challenges the on-field decision. Big bouncer on middle, the batsman was late on the hook. Grazes the top edge, then the helmet and then flies into the gloves of Watling down
Neesham to Zampa, 2 runs back of a length and outside off, punched in the air over the covers
Neesham to Zampa, no run wide yorker outside off, Zampa shuffles across, swishes, and is beaten. Very close to being called a wide

6.05pm From 92 for 4 in 20.1 overs, Australia finish at 324 for 8. New Zealand's bowling, especially at the slog overs was poor and their fielding was probably worse. Steven Smith led the way with the bat for the hosts, hitting 164 - the highest individual score at the SCG - and found able support from Travis Head, who made a half-century
Back for the resumption. Guptill and Latham. Starc has the ball with two slips in place.
Starc to Guptill, no run lovely start. 142 kph, full on middle. The ball moves back in and Guptill defends towards mid-on
Starc to Guptill, no run 146 kph, full and swinging again. But sliding down leg. Guptill misses a flick and is struck on the pad
Starc to Guptill, no run nice flowing drive. 145 kph, full outside off, thrashed to extra cover
Starc to Guptill, no run 146 kph, full and straight from Starc. Lovely lines, defended back
Starc to Guptill, no run 149 kph, clips the pad on its way to the keeper. Strays down leg again does Starc
Starc to Guptill, no run 149.7 kph, overpitched outside off from Starc. Guptill drives to extra cover. Maiden to start
Hazlewood to Latham, 2 runs lovely start. Full and swinging back in, 140 kph, worked through square leg for a couple. Got bat down in time
Hazlewood to Latham, 1 wide full and wide, 143 kph. Too wide outside off and called
Hazlewood to Latham, no run 138 ks. Close to off outside off, nice channel. Left alone by Latham
Hazlewood to Latham, no run 141 kph, overpitched outside off, Latham goes after it but the ball misses the outside edge. Just a hint of lateral movement
Hazlewood to Latham, no run good length outside off, left alone
Hazlewood to Latham, no run 138 kph, nice and close to off from Hazlewood, defended into the off side

Hazlewood to Latham, OUT gone! Another early wicket for Australia. Latham chops on. Good length outside off, fifth-stump channel. Latham looks to prod one into the off side but the ball moves back late. Takes the inside edge and clatters into the stumps. Another opening batsman undone by just a hint of lateral movement. Well bowled
Starc to Guptill, no run full outside off, defended into the off side
Starc to Guptill, no run good length outside off, 145 kph. Guptill stays in the crease and defends to point. Lovely line
Starc to Guptill, no run 146 kph, full on off, a hint of inward movement. Pushed to mid-off
Starc to Guptill, no run a nervous block. Fullish length close to off, Guptill gets forward and looks to defend. Tentatively plays it into his body
Starc to Guptill, FOUR runs lovely stroke. 146 kph, full and straight. Guptill plants his front foot forward and lofts the ball neatly over mid-on. Doesn't bother keeping it down.
Starc to Guptill, no run superb follow-up. 149 kph, searing yorker on middle and leg. Guptill does well to keep it out
Hazlewood to Williamson, 1 run quality single. Full outside off, swinging away. Williamson pushes into the off side for quick run
Hazlewood to Guptill, no run full and straight, 138 kph, pushed to mid-on
Hazlewood to Guptill, SIX runs lovely from Guptill. Full delivery around off, Guptill backs away, makes a bit of room and lofts the ball straight over the bowler's head. Sublime stroke-making.
Hazlewood to Guptill, no run 141 kph, good length on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on from the crease
Hazlewood to Guptill, no run 135 kph, good length outside off, pushed out towards cover from the crease
Hazlewood to Guptill, no run good length on off, 137 kph, blocked.
Starc to Williamson, no run good length outside off, 146 kph, left alone by Williamson
Starc to Williamson, no run close to off with a full length. Defended into the off side
Starc to Williamson, no run nice channel. 146 kph, good length on a sixth-stump line. Williamson dabs towards backward point
Starc to Williamson, no run full outside off again, slightly wider of the crease. Defended
Starc to Williamson, FOUR runs superb shot. Back of a length outside off, Williamson gets on top of the bounce, got both his feet off the ground at point of impact and cut the ball over point.
Starc to Williamson, no run 148 kph, good length around off, defended
Hazlewood to Guptill, 2 runs on the pads, worked away through backward square leg for a couple. Good shot again
Hazlewood to Guptill, no run full delivery outside off, skewed off the outside half to point
Hazlewood to Guptill, no run 139 kph, good length on the pads, nudged away to mid-on
Hazlewood to Guptill, 1 run another good single. Just tapped into the leg side, towards mid-on for a quick run
Hazlewood to Williamson, no run 139 kph, overpitched on off, driven to mid-on
Hazlewood to Williamson, no run nice and full outside off, left alone by Williamson. Good over
Starc to Guptill, SIX runs shot! Another six. Just a flick of the wrists. Full and straight, aided by some inward movement. Guptill whips the ball off his pads over the deep square leg boundary
Starc to Guptill, 1 run full and straight again, driven through cover. Warner chases it down from mid-off
Starc to Williamson, no run uppish, short of point. Back of a length outside off, Williamson looks to cut but the ball skews off the outside half and falls just short of Bailey at backward point
Starc to Williamson, no run 151 kph, full on off, driven to mid-off
Starc to Williamson, FOUR runs delightful. 147 kph, overpitched on off. Williamson drives the ball past his partner. Superb straight drive
Starc to Williamson, no run 147 kph, full and straight, defended. Good over
Hazlewood to Guptill, 1 wide 141 kph, drifts down leg, wide
Hazlewood to Guptill, no run 142 kph, good length outside off, the ball comes back in. Guided to point from the crease
Hazlewood to Guptill, 1 run good length on the pads, 135 kph, worked to midwicket for a run
Hazlewood to Williamson, no run 140 kph, overpitched outside off, driven to short cover
Hazlewood to Williamson, no run full outside off, 139 kph, solidly defended

Hazlewood to Williamson, OUT gone. Huge wicket. Williamson nicks off. Full outside off, the ball holds its shape. Williamson goes after it, looking to drive through the off side. Gets a thick outside edge which carries at head height to Smith at first slip who takes a sharp reverse-cupped catch. NZ lose their best batsman.
Hazlewood to Neesham, no run 143 kph, back of a length on off, defended into the off side
Marsh to Guptill, no run 125 kph, close to off, left alone
Marsh to Guptill, no run 126 kph, keeps it outside off with a full length. Left alone too
Marsh to Guptill, 1 run 131 kph, overpitched outside off, drilled to long-off for one
Marsh to Neesham, no run angled across the left-hander on a good length, no stroke offered
Marsh to Neesham, 3 runs nicely played. 129 kph, overpitched on off, sweetly driven back past Guptill for three to mid-off. Full face of the bat
Marsh to Guptill, 1 run 128 kph, another quick single. Good length outside off, pushed to mid-on. Sets off immediately
Hazlewood to Guptill, no run 139 kph, full on off, driven to mid-off
Hazlewood to Guptill, no run 135 kph, good length outside off, swerving back in. Punched to extra cover from the crease
Hazlewood to Guptill, 1 run on the pads and flicked away through midwicket for one
Hazlewood to Neesham, FOUR runs 140 kph, on the pads and Neesham flicks away through midwicket for four. Lovely shot. Putting away the bad ball
Hazlewood to Neesham, no run beauty. Full delivery outside off, 139 kph, the ball moves away late and beats the bat. Lovely bowling
Hazlewood to Neesham, no run 138 kph, full on off, shovelled to square leg
Marsh to Guptill, no run 130 kph, full and straight, defended
Marsh to Guptill, 1 run full outside off, 131 kph, driven to the deep cover fielder
Marsh to Neesham, no run 134 kph, overpitched outside off, driven back to the bowler
Marsh to Neesham, no run 135 kph, full and wide from Marsh. Neesham throws his hands at that but misses
Marsh to Neesham, no run good length outside off, played into the off side
Marsh to Neesham, no run 131 kph, impeccable channel just outside off, Neesham defends into the off side
Cummins to Guptill, FOUR runs superb shot. Back of a length outside off, the ball sits up for Guptill, Hammered to the deep cover boundary with a swat off the front foot
Cummins to Guptill, no run 141 kph, glided to backward point from the crease
Cummins to Guptill, FOUR runs 145 kph, overpitched on middle, worked away into the gap at midwicket with ease. Strays on the pads. Not a good delivery
Cummins to Guptill, no run better. Good length outside off, pushed to cover
Cummins to Guptill, no run good length on off, defended into the off side
Cummins to Guptill, FOUR runs four more. Short and wide outside off, Guptill laces his cut and finds the gap behind point for four. Another great stroke
Marsh to Neesham, no run 132 kph, full on off, worked into the leg side
Marsh to Neesham, no run full on a sixth-stump line, caressed to extra cover from the crease
Marsh to Neesham, 1 run just a push to Warner at mid-on for one, good single
Marsh to Guptill, 1 run short and wide outside off, slapped in front of cover for a run
Marsh to Neesham, no run ah, should have done more with that. Short and wide outside off, scythed to extra cover

Marsh to Neesham, FOUR runs another lovely lofted drive. Full on the fourth stump from Marsh, Neesham calmly lifts his checked drive over mid-o. The ball lands just in front of the boundary cushion before popping up off it
Cummins to Guptill, FOUR runs 143 kph, full and wide from Cummins. With the extra pace, the ball flies off the bat. Guptill flays and sends the ball whistling past point for four
Cummins to Guptill, no run good riposte. Back of a length at 144 kph, Guptill sways away from the line
Cummins to Guptill, no run short and wide, 142 kph. Guptill wants to cut over point but can't make contact. Nice idea, just lacking in execution
Cummins to Guptill, 1 run shortish and wide outside off, slashed to deep point
Cummins to Neesham, 1 run just wide of him. Impossible to catch them, just have to stick. Strays on the pads and flicked just past Bailey at short leg
Cummins to Guptill, no run excellent bouncer. Well-directed. Guptill gets underneath that and lets it go. Good stuff
Zampa to Neesham, 1 run shortish and wide outside off, swatted to long-on with a drag
Zampa to Guptill, 1 run 84 kph, slow outside off, punched to long-off
Zampa to Neesham, no run 84 kph, slow through the air but a bit leg side-ish too, off the pad to square leg
Zampa to Neesham, no run 89 kph, flat on off and middle, worked to midwicket
Zampa to Neesham, 1 run shortish and flat, drilled down to long-on
Zampa to Guptill, no run 95 kph, quicker through the air, straight and full and pushed to cover
Cummins to Neesham, no run 146.2ks head-high bouncer on the leg stump, Neesham sinks under it
Cummins to Neesham, 1 run chest-high short ball on middle, swatted away to long leg
Cummins to Guptill, FOUR runs short and wide outside off, 145ks, it probably went faster to the boundary. Rasping cut, sends it to the square boundary. Becomes the quickest NZ player to 5000 ODI runs
Cummins to Guptill, no run 147.5ks, good length and outside off, push-driven to the covers
Cummins to Guptill, no run pretty full on off, nearly 148ks, Guptill presses forward and drives the ball to mid-on
Cummins to Guptill, no run back of a length on off, 145.9ks, tapped to extra cover
Zampa to Neesham, no run flatter on middle and leg, hangs back and whips to square leg
Zampa to Neesham, no run pushed through quicker, Neesham has a big slog-sweep across the line and does not connect. It clearly pitched outside leg
Zampa to Neesham, 1 run googly, but Zampa goes short, pulled away to deep midwicket
Zampa to Guptill, no run
Zampa to Guptill, 1 run short skidder on middle, stays back and pulls down to long-on
Zampa to Neesham, 1 run slower through the air on middle, chipped in the air, Warner runs in and attacks the ball from long-on, but it lands in front of him
Cummins to Neesham, FOUR runs very full on middle, 146ks, Neesham is on the move as he shovels it away wide of mid-on
Cummins to Neesham, 1 leg bye veering into the hips, 147.3ks, the batsman is late onto the flick. Off the high and rolls square through the leg side
Cummins to Guptill, 1 run much fuller and angled in on off, Guptill glides it to third man and raises his fifty off 55 balls
Cummins to Neesham, 1 run full and outside off, throws his hands at it with no feet and slices an outside edge down to third man
Cummins to Guptill, FOUR runs lifter outside off, 144ks, Guptill arches back and ramps it smartly over the top of Smith at first slip. One-bounce four
Cummins to Guptill, 1 run length and outside off, Guptill takes it on the up and middles a drive to the left of mid-off
Zampa to Guptill, 1 run straight ball on middle, driven down to long-off
Zampa to Neesham, 1 run shorter and outside off, punched on the back foot to long-on
Zampa to Guptill, no run slides on quick outside off, back-foot force to extra cover
Zampa to Guptill, no run tossed slower on middle, pushed back to the bowler

Zampa to Guptill, no run Bailey at midwicket spills a tough catch, or at best a half-chance. Half-tracker outside off, Guptill rocks back and pummels a pull. Bailey attempts the catch with both hands, but he was late on it. That was a rocket from Guptill. Bursts through the hands of the fielder
Zampa to Guptill, 3 runs shorter and outside off, chopped away in the gap at backward point
Starc to Guptill, 1 run good length on middle, squirted to midwicket off the inside edge
Starc to Neesham, no run back of a length and outside off, nearly 148ks, Neesham looks to cut and ends up skewing it towards point off the inside half. Hustled for pace
Starc to Neesham, FOUR runs clears long-on. Length ball on off, Neesham hangs back and swings it over the fielder with a straight bat. Much like a short-arm jab
Starc to Neesham, FOUR runs beats mid-off (Cummins) to his left. Half-volley outside off, belted down the ground. Boom
Starc to Neesham, no run Starc pulls his length back on middle, Neesham leaps off his feet and fends it onto the pitch
Starc to Neesham, 2 runs pitched up and outside off, sliced in the air over the covers
Zampa to Guptill, no run full on middle, gets forward and taps it to the left of the bowler
Zampa to Guptill, 2 runs tossed-up legbreak outside off, Guptill backs away outside leg and chips it inside out over extra cover. Long-off moves to his left to collect the ball
Zampa to Guptill, FOUR runs rank half-tracker outside off, goes back and unleashes a rasping pull to the right of Bailey at midwicket, beats Travis Head at deep square leg to his left

Zampa to Guptill, SIX runs flighted legbreak outside off, Guptill likes the width and marmalises a six over extra cover. Just skimmed off the middle of the bat. Clears the long boundary with some nonchalance
Zampa to Guptill, no run tossed on the stumps, driven along the ground to extra cover
Zampa to Guptill, 1 run straight just outside off, driven firmly to long-off
Starc to Guptill, no run overpitched and outside off, drilled to extra cover

Starc to Guptill, FOUR runs full and slanting away outside off, Guptill goes hard on a drive and slices an outside edge past the outstretched right hand of point. Head runs across to his left in the deep, dives, his hand was in contact with the ad board while collecting the ball. Another four for Guptill
Starc to Guptill, no run short and skids in, 144.6ks, extra bounce pings the glove
Starc to Guptill, 1 run good length and outside off, punched on the up to mid-off
Starc to Guptill, 1 run banged in short on the leg stump, hops and fends the ball to square leg
Zampa to Guptill, 1 run dropped short and outside off, slapped away to sweeper cover
Zampa to Watling, no run shorter legbreak outside off, beats Watling's attempted cut
Zampa to Watling, no run tossed on middle, presses forward and defends it back to the bowler
Zampa to Watling, 2 runs low full-toss on middle, paddled fine of long leg
Zampa to Watling, 1 run short and turning away, leans back and punches through cover
Zampa to Guptill, SIX runs too short on middle, Guptill is quick to read the length. Nimbly skips back and bludgeons a pull over midwicket
Starc to Watling, no run full, and angled in just outside off, squeezed to cover
Starc to Watling, no run wide of the crease, 145.8ks, straightens away a bit outside off, Watling chases an expansive drive and does not connect
Starc to Watling, no run wide of the crease and angled into a front-foot push to mid-on
Starc to Watling, no run full and cuts away outside off, dabbed to point
Starc to Watling, no run very full and on off, driven straight to cover on the front foot
Starc to Watling, 1 run full and holds its line outside off, Watling drives to sweeper cover and picks up a single
Marsh to Watling, no run short and just outside off, cramps the batsman for room. Played back to the bowler
Marsh to Watling, 2 runs spooned over the head of Warner, running back and to his left from mid-off. Good length and outside off, Watling plays early, chips, and escapes

Marsh to Watling, OUT whoa, Smith has pulled off a stunning catch. He flies to his left like a goalkeeper and completes an incredible one-handed catch. Lands face-first, but tucks the ball up against his ribs, and hangs on. Smith's team-mates jump onto him. This was a poor ball, though - short and wide outside off - Watling cuts ha
Marsh to Munro, no run back of a length on middle, defended
Marsh to Munro, 2 runs length and outside off, jabbing punch to deep cover
Marsh to Munro, no run short and angling across off, guided to point
Cummins to Guptill, no run back of a length and outside off, swish and a miss
Cummins to Guptill, no run short and angled in, angled to backward point
Cummins to Guptill, 1 run short and just outside off, hops and glides it down to third man
Cummins to Munro, no run very full and outside off, shovel-driven to extra cover, who dives to his left and deflects the ball to mid-off

Cummins to Munro, SIX runs Munro chases the long boundary and just clears Head at the edge of the boundary. Good length and outside off, swung away in the air. Head runs across to his right from deep midwicket, dives full-length, and finger-tips it over the boundary. Even if he had caught it, he would have landed outside the ad boa
Cummins to Munro, 1 run short and outside off, cut firmly to sweeper cover
Marsh to Munro, no run back of a length and outside off, punched to point
Marsh to Munro, 1 run length and outside off, stabbed away square on the off side
Marsh to Guptill, no run back of a length and outside off, chopped behind to the keeper via a bottom edge
Marsh to Guptill, SIX runs just short of a good length and outside off, baseball-swings it into the stands beyond wide long-on
Marsh to Guptill, 1 run push-driven down to long-off
Marsh to Munro, no run back of a length on middle, punched to extra cover
Cummins to Guptill, no run back of a length and angled in, solidly defended back to the bowler
Cummins to Guptill, 1 run short and outside off, gets on top of it and rides it down to third man
Cummins to Munro, 1 run back of a length and outside off, punches and skews an outside edge to third man
Cummins to Guptill, no run back of a length and outside off, punched to the right of extra cover
Cummins to Guptill, 1 run short and angled in at the ribs, leaps and steers the ball down to fine leg
Cummins to Munro, 1 run too straight in line, picked off to deep midwicket
Marsh to Munro, no run back of a length and outside off, front-foot punch back to the bowler
Marsh to Munro, no run good length and and angled in on middle, worked to midwicket
Marsh to Munro, no run back of a length on off and middle, cramps him for room. Chopped to point
Marsh to Munro, no run back of a length and angled in, the batsman misses the leg-side flick. Flies off the inside of the front thigh into backward point's hands
Marsh to Munro, no run back of a length and swerves in, pushed back to Marsh
Marsh to Munro, no run back of a length on off, crams Munro up for room. Stabbed back to the bowler. Rare maiden
Cummins to Guptill, no run back of a length, angled in, straightens away outside off past the skittish poke of Guptill
Cummins to Guptill, no run full on off, pushed in the air to the left of the bowler to mid-off
Cummins to Guptill, no run back of a length on off, chopped behind to superman Smith. Nine dots in a row
Cummins to Guptill, no run back of a length on off, late-cut away, can't beat Smith at backward point. 10 dots in a row
Cummins to Guptill, 1 run short and angled in, cramps him for room. Worked in front of midwicket for a quick one
Cummins to Munro, no run full and wide outside off, half-volley, stabbed only as far as mid-off
Marsh to Guptill, 1 run good length and outside off, driven fine of backward point
Marsh to Munro, no run back of a length and outside off, stands tall and punches straight to mid-off
Marsh to Munro, no run full and outside off, lashed on the front foot to extra cover
Marsh to Munro, 1 run short and angled in just a shade outside off, forced down to long-off. Munro gets a run after nine balls
Marsh to Guptill, SIX runs what a way to bring up a century. This is a Guptill special
Marsh to Guptill, 1 run good length and outside off, punched down to long-off
Hazlewood to Guptill, 2 leg byes length and angled into leg stump, rolls off the thigh fine on the leg side
Hazlewood to Guptill, 1 run back of a length and veers in on off, Guptill aims to drive through the off side, ends up squirting an inside edge down to long-on
Hazlewood to Munro, no run back of a length on off, pushed to point. The pressure on Munro rises

Hazlewood to Munro, no run full and angling away outside off, the left-hander looks to drive, and gets an outside edge, which does not carry to Steven Smith, who had moved from midwicket to slip before this ball
Hazlewood to Munro, 1 run back of a length and outside off, punched crisply to sweeper cover for one
Hazlewood to Guptill, 1 run back of a length, chopped from off stump fine of backward point
Zampa to Guptill, 1 run starts off with a short one outside off, cracked away to backward point, who dives and takes some pace off the ball
Zampa to Munro, 1 run slower through the air, legbreak, which dips late in its flight, inside-edged to midwicket
Zampa to Guptill, 2 runs tossed on middle, little chip over the bowler's head. Guptill and Munro hare across for two

Zampa to Guptill, FOUR runs Finch races in from sweeper cover, attacks the ball, as opposed to staying back and protecting the boundary. The ball lands in front of him and rolls away to the boundary. Slower legbreak outside off, some extra spin, Guptill aims to drive and ends up slicing it in the air. He gets away
Zampa to Guptill, no run fuller and quicker on middle, defended

Zampa to Guptill, OUT Guptill has hit a dirty long hop to midwicket. Maxwell leaps, and takes the overhead catch on the second attempt. Guptill drops to his knees in despair. Dragged short and outside off, skids on Guptill pulls it flat and hard. Finds the substitute fielder
Hazlewood to Munro, 1 run length and angling away outside off, jabbed away to the right of extra cover
Hazlewood to Santner, no run short and moving across the left-hander, skirting past the outside edge
Hazlewood to Santner, no run full on off, Santner does not move his feet much. Played back to the bowler
Hazlewood to Santner, no run back of a length and seaming away outside off, beats the outside edge lavishly again
Hazlewood to Santner, no run and again. Good length and zipping away outside off, past the nervy prod
Hazlewood to Santner, no run good length and curling away outside off, Santner has a flirt before drawing his bat inside the line
Zampa to Munro, no run skids into the pads, misses the flick
Zampa to Munro, 1 run tossed up just outside leg, worked away behind square
Zampa to Santner, no run looped up on leg stump, nearly spooned back to the bowler

Zampa to Santner, OUT holes out to Warner at long-on. Dolly catch. With two wickets in five balls, Zampa has tilted it Australia's way. Tossed-up legbreak on off, dips late in its flight. Santner lofts it half-heartedly, the bat turns in his hands, and picks out Warner to perfection, who blows a kiss and celebrates the catch
Zampa to Munro, no run pitched up on off, flicked to midwicket
Zampa to Munro, 1 run skidding into the pads, flicked square through the leg side
Hazlewood to Munro, 1 run back of a length and angling away outside off, dabbed to the right of extra cover for one
Hazlewood to de Grandhomme, no run full and breaks back into de Grandhomme, chopped to the covers
Hazlewood to de Grandhomme, 1 run full and moves in, inside-edged onto the pad. The ball rolls towards square leg
Hazlewood to Munro, FOUR runs back of a length and outside off, mowed over the bowler's head. Swatted away with a flat-bat. That's Munro's second boundary, and his first since the 26th over
Hazlewood to Munro, no run guided towards backward point
Hazlewood to Munro, 1 run good length and ducks back in, pops an inside edge near where short midwicket would have been
Zampa to Munro, 1 run short on middle, leans back and outside leg as he punches to sweeper cover

Zampa to de Grandhomme, no run skids on flat and just outside off, beats the batsman, nearly shaves the off stump. Stumping chance sent upstairs,bounces over the off stump. Wade swipes the bails off. De Grandhomme's back foot is grounded
Zampa to de Grandhomme, no run down the track, takes a full ball and stabs it to the right of the bowler
Zampa to de Grandhomme, 1 run use his feet and drills a straight drive
Zampa to Munro, 1 run looped up on middle and leg, nurdled to midwicket
Zampa to de Grandhomme, no run short and wide outside off, beats the cut
Hazlewood to Munro, no run Wade takes it in front of his head. Sharp bouncer on middle and leg, Munro ducks under it
Hazlewood to Munro, 1 run slog-swept away to deep midwicket
Hazlewood to de Grandhomme, FOUR runs full and just outside off, whipped in the air over wide mid-on

Hazlewood to de Grandhomme, OUT very full, and cuts in, de Grandhomme is stapled to the crease as he plays across the line. The ball skids on to rap his front pad plumb in front of middle. No signs of an inside edge. Umpire Dharmasena's finger goes up. The batsman reviews more out of hope rather than conviction. He has no hope at a
Hazlewood to Henry, FOUR runs 141.8ks, yorker, hoops in sharply, Henry is late to jam his bat down, inside-edged past the leg stump to the left of the keeper
Hazlewood to Henry, FOUR runs pretty full on off, Henry hangs back and flat-bats it powerfully through the covers
Zampa to Munro, FOUR runs three boundaries in a row for NZ. Tossed up outside off, hammered away over extra cover
Zampa to Munro, no run skidding into the pads, turns, misses the flick
Zampa to Munro, FOUR runs legbreak on middle and leg, backs away and lofts it over mid-off, who is up
Zampa to Munro, 1 run dragged down on leg stump, punched down to long-on

Zampa to Henry, no run tossed up and drifts in to hit the back pad in front of leg stump, not sure if straightened enough. Zampa gestures it was heading down leg, but Australia challenge the not-out on-field call from Martell, and review. No inside edge, and ball tracking detects it was pitching outside leg.
Zampa to Henry, 2 runs looped up and outside off, lofts at this legbreak, and slices it in front of Warner tearing in from long-off
Hazlewood to Munro, no run back of a length and slanting away outside off, Munro has a massive mow and does not connect
Hazlewood to Munro, 1 run full-toss on off, driven to sweeper cover
Hazlewood to Henry, no run just short of a good length on middle, flat-batted to midwicket
Hazlewood to Henry, no run back of a length and bounces over the stumps as Henry backs away, swishes wildly, and does not make contact
Hazlewood to Henry, no run back of a length and outside off, flat-bats a drive and finds mid-off
Hazlewood to Henry, FOUR runs length ball on off, Henry eyes a leg-side swipe, the ball takes a thick outside edge and rolls down to the third man fence
Zampa to Munro, 1 run reverse swept from off stump to backward square leg
Zampa to Henry, SIX runs tossed up outside off, slog-swept over wide long-on for a six, caught in the crowd
Zampa to Henry, 1 run full and fired on middle, hacks at it, and sends an inside edge to long leg
Zampa to Munro, no run full and outside off, poked to point
Zampa to Munro, no run pushed through on off, turns, Munro does not connect with a reverse-sweep
Zampa to Munro, no run googly turns away outside off, pushed into the covers
Cummins to Henry, 1 run very full and angled in, inside-edged to fine leg

Cummins to Munro, 1 run Munro's bat is broken. One part flies over cover, the other over midwicket. Very full and outside off, he throws his hands at a drive and secures a single. Munro has the part of the bat with just the handle. Bizarre play. The impact was near the bottom of the bat
Cummins to Henry, 1 run back of a length on middle, slogged away to deep midwicket
Cummins to Munro, 1 wide off-side wide

Cummins to Munro, FOUR runs tucked away square of short fine leg, Marsh runs around the ball, chases, then makes a mess of the slide, the batsman gets four. Marsh just dragged the ball along with him to the boundary boards
Cummins to Munro, 1 run Munro plays it to midwicket and sets off. A direct hit from Warner could have dismissed him
Cummins to Henry, FOUR runs length ball on middle, clears his front leg and meatily clubs it away for a one-bounce four to long-on
Marsh to Munro, 2 runs full and wide outside off, slashes a drive to sweeper cover
Marsh to Munro, no run 114.2ks slower one outside off, swish and a miss
Marsh to Munro, no run even slower, 113ks, guided to short third man
Marsh to Munro, no run slower bouncer on middle, 110ks, half-ducks under it
Marsh to Munro, 1 run short and slow outside off, 111.6ks, slapped away to sweeper cover's right
Marsh to Henry, 1 wide wide yorker outside off, too wide, according to the umpire. Henry reaches out and does not connect
Marsh to Henry, no run fuller and outside off, possibly slower, wild swing and a miss
Cummins to Munro, 1 run short and outside off, sits up, shovel-pulled away to deep midwicket

Cummins to Henry, OUT full and outside off, right in the hitting slot. Henry clears his front leg and swipes the slower one in the air. He plays early. He gets more height as opposed to distance. Bailey runs in from deep midwicket and tracks down the skier. First wicket for Cummins on return
Cummins to Munro, 1 run very full and wide outside off, carved down to third man
Cummins to Ferguson, 1 leg bye very full and slants in, takes the pad and wanders away through square leg
Cummins to Ferguson, no run full and curves in, inside-edged onto the pad
Marsh to Boult, 1 run slower full toss on off, clipped away to midwicket
That is all we have for you from this game. Thanks for tuning in. Looking forward to your company for the second ODI on Tuesday. Goodnight and cheers for now.

Guptill's 11th ODI century, filled with trademark drives and lofts - lit up New Zealand's steep chase, but it fizzled out once Zampa struck twice in five balls. Cummins and Marsh then took care of the tail to seal a 68-run victory.

10pm It was Smith's day at the SCG. He was reprieved on 13, and 152, and went on to rack up 164 - the highest individual score at this venue. His century and Head's half-century propelled Australia to 324 for 8 from 92 for 4. Smith then pulled off a scorching catch when he barely had any time to react to send back Watling.
Australia won by 68 runs
Player of the match is Steven Smith, AUS
